results.title: Police Announce Traffic Plan for Carnival 2025
results.summary: The Royal Police Force of Antigua and Barbuda has released its Traffic Management Plan for the 2025 Carnival season, including temporary road closures and diversions to ensure public safety. While the article focuses on logistical arrangements, Christians are reminded to prioritize godly behavior during such events, as "righteousness exalteth a nation: but sin is a reproach to any people" (Proverbs 14:34).

results.title: Prince George Celebrates 12th Birthday with New Photo
results.summary: Prince George, son of the Prince and Princess of Wales, celebrated his 12th birthday with a new photo released on social media. The photo, taken in Norfolk, shows George smiling and leaning on a wooden gate. The article mentions his public appearances and his parents' desire for a normal upbringing. "Happy is the man that findeth wisdom, and the man that getteth understanding" (Proverbs 3:13). Let us guide our children in the path of righteousness and truth.

results.title: Nasha Mukt Abhiyan: Budgam Schools Raise Awareness Against Drug Abuse
results.summary: IEC campaigns in Budgam schools educate students and communities on the dangers of drug abuse, promoting a "Nasha Mukt" (Drug-Free) lifestyle. The initiative aligns with Christian values of promoting a sound mind and body, as detailed in 1 Corinthians 6:19-20: "What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own? For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's."

title: Police Announce Traffic Plan for Carnival 2025
